fullName: Full library name; if left blank the implementation folder name will be used
documentation: Reference link (for docs, github, etc.); e.g. https://link-to-docs.com
description: OPTIONAL custom description, if field is omitted description will be pulled from Github repo

coreLibrary.name: <display name of core GraphQL library - ONLY INCLUDE THIS SECTION IF DIFFERENT THAN THE MAIN LIBRARY REPO>
coreLibrary.link: github repo | NPM link | other distribution link

federationlibrary.name: <display name of Federation library - ONLY INCLUDE THIS SECTION IF DIFFERENT THAN THE MAIN LIBRARY REPO>
federationlibrary.link: github repo | NPM link | other distribution link
